name: Group Interview - Scene 2
description: Behind the Scenes of ConnecTeen - Room 2 - Participate and pass group interview
hints: You might find more info regarding this on the ConnecTeen website from the previous scene.
Did you try swapping the two blank tiles?

In order to solve this room, you need to solve the jigsaw puzzle. The terms non-judgemental, confidential, supportive, understanding and knowledgeable (in the same order) are found on the ConnecTeen website from the previous scene.
